short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Qvidian for Web (EU Hosting) allows you to find and use RFP answers, sales content and more, right from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now your entire organization can easily access content managed in Qvidian with Qvidian for Web. Help your RFP team respond to online RFPs or find answers easily online and benefit other teams, or infrequent users, by giving them access to approved content stored in a centralized repository in an interface that is easy to use. 

Qvidian for Web (EU Hosting) allows you to find and use RFP answers, sales content and more, right from your browser. Finding exactly what you’re looking for couldn’t be easier when you take advantage of Qvidian’s suggested filters and learned terms. 

With Qvidian for Web you can: 
- Run broad searches across your entire library or focus in to search among selected folders. 
- Narrow search results with filters using standard properties, like Content ID, Date Last Modified, and Language, or your custom metadata fields. 
- View, copy and download best matches for quick use.  
- Search Qvidian or selected text on a page by clicking a button, or copying and pasting, and customize the fields you want to search with. 
- Participate in the ongoing quality of the content by submitting feedback to the content owners.  

Why choose Upland Qvidian? 

Upland Qvidian automates away the tedious and frustrating parts of your RFx response and proposal processes. With Qvidian, sales and proposal teams can collaborate effortlessly to quickly deliver polished and compliant proposals, presentations, and sales documents. 

More than 1,000 companies rely on Qvidian, including eight of the ten largest U.S. banks and six of the ten largest European banks. Worldwide, over 200,000 users trust Qvidian to meet deadlines, tame proposal content chaos, and win more deals. 

Want to learn more? Request a demo and see how Qvidian can help you craft more persuasive proposals, presentations, and sales documents: https://uplandsoftware.com/qvidian/demo-request/
